channel.title: Dreams on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dreams on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: My List of 100 Dreams
item.description: Have y’all heard of Laura Vanderkam’s “List of 100 Dreams” idea? I hadn’t, but I have now, and I love it. To me, it feels like a bucket list, but better: the items don’t have to feel realistic, or things you can only do if you put the time aside.
